post.title: I’m Indexed, Therefore I Am
post.content: Feedster’s blog indicates they have been “heavily revising the crawler architecture“. I would guess they’ve actually been revising the design (a rant for another time). Either way, it’s nice to see they are indexing me once again. Thanks for getting that fixed, Scott! Also, I slightly updated my blogroll. Mostly adds, one or two subtractions.
